What role does human input play in prompt engineering?
A. Human input is not necessary for prompt engineering
B. Human input is essential for designing effective prompts and evaluating model outputs
C. Human input is only required during the training phase of AI models
D. Human input is necessary for adjusting hyperparameters during model generation
quizSrc.definition:
B - Con người cần thiết để thiết kế prompt hiệu quả và đánh giá đầu ra của mô hình.
A sai vì AI chưa thể tự làm toàn bộ.
C sai vì prompt engineering chủ yếu diễn ra khi sử dụng mô hình, không chỉ lúc huấn luyện.
D sai vì điều chỉnh siêu tham số không phải là phần chính của prompt engineering.

quizSrc.term:
Ravi is debating which Generative AI tool he can use to improve and index his code. Can you guide him based on the tools listed here?
A. DALLE
B. GitHub Copilot
C. Bard
D. Synthesia
quizSrc.definition:
B. GitHub Copilot
Giải thích: GitHub Copilot là công cụ AI hỗ trợ lập trình, có thể gợi ý, cải thiện và giúp tổ chức mã nguồn, phù hợp để cải thiện và index code.
- A. DALLE: Sai, đây là công cụ tạo hình ảnh từ văn bản, không hỗ trợ lập trình.
- C. Bard: Sai, đây là chatbot AI, không chuyên sâu cho cải thiện hoặc index code.
- D. Synthesia: Sai, đây là công cụ tạo video từ văn bản, không liên quan đến lập trình.

quizSrc.term:
How do well-implemented 'digressions' contribute to user satisfaction within chatbot interactions?
A. By creating predictable conversation patterns
B. By restricting the variety of conversation paths
C. By offering engaging and unexpected conversational turns
D. By limiting conversational flexibility
quizSrc.definition:
C. By offering engaging and unexpected conversational turns
Giải thích: Digressions khi được thực hiện tốt giúp tạo ra những đoạn hội thoại bất ngờ và thú vị, làm tăng sự hứng thú và cảm giác tự nhiên của người dùng.
- A sai vì tạo mẫu hội thoại dự đoán được sẽ làm giảm sự bất ngờ và thú vị.
- B sai vì hạn chế con đường hội thoại sẽ làm giảm tính phong phú và sáng tạo.
- D sai vì giới hạn sự linh hoạt sẽ khiến hội thoại trở nên khô khan, thiếu tương tác tự nhiên.

quizSrc.term:
Which of the following do you need to create in order to publish a notebook to your GitHub repository?
A. Apps
B. Profile
C. Access token
D. Login credential
quizSrc.definition:
C. Access token
Giải thích: Để có thể xuất bản notebook lên GitHub, bạn cần tạo một Personal Access Token để xác thực thay cho mật khẩu.
- A sai vì "Apps" không phải là yêu cầu cần thiết để đăng notebook.
- B sai vì "Profile" là tài khoản GitHub chung, không phải công cụ xác thực xuất bản.
- D sai vì "Login credential" (tài khoản đăng nhập) không được GitHub khuyến nghị dùng trực tiếp, thay vào đó là Access Token.

quizSrc.term:
Which of these are attributes of IBM's Cognitive APIs?
A. IBM Cognitive APIs are based on an input/output system, where your input is data that the API feeds into Watson, and the output is the delivery of the overall outcome based on that data.
B. IBM Cognitive APIs can process only structured data as input and unstructured data as output.
C. IBM Cognitive APIs serve as a messenger between the input data and the output files on your local machine. These output files can then be transferred to the cloud.
D. IBM's Cognitive APIs help AI professionals to build apps for mobile devices.
quizSrc.definition:
A. IBM Cognitive APIs are based on an input/output system, where your input is data that the API feeds into Watson, and the output is the delivery of the overall outcome based on that data.
Giải thích: IBM's Cognitive APIs (như Watson) nhận dữ liệu đầu vào (có thể là structured hoặc unstructured), xử lý bằng AI và trả lại kết quả phù hợp.
- B sai vì API không chỉ xử lý structured data, mà còn cả unstructured data.
- C sai vì API không hoạt động như một "messenger" lưu file cục bộ rồi chuyển lên cloud.
- D sai vì API không chỉ tập trung vào xây dựng app mobile, mà hỗ trợ nhiều ứng dụng AI khác nhau.

quizSrc.term:
What are 'context variables' in chatbot conversations?
A. User authentication methods
B. Temporary data storage during conversations
C. Graphic design elements
D. Server configurations
quizSrc.definition:
B. Temporary data storage during conversations
Giải thích: Context variables trong chatbot lưu trữ tạm thời thông tin (ví dụ: tên người dùng, lựa chọn trước đó) trong suốt hội thoại để giữ ngữ cảnh và tạo trải nghiệm liền mạch.
- A sai vì phương thức xác thực người dùng không phải là chức năng chính của context variables.
- C sai vì context variables không liên quan đến thiết kế đồ họa.
- D sai vì cấu hình máy chủ không thuộc phạm vi xử lý của context variables.

quizSrc.term:
How do chatbots use context variables and slots to maintain context during a conversation?
A. By ignoring the user's input
B. By storing information about the user's preferences and previous interactions
C. By generating random responses
D. By terminating the conversation after a set number of interactions
quizSrc.definition:
B. By storing information about the user's preferences and previous interactions
Giải thích: Context variables và slots giúp chatbot ghi nhớ thông tin về sở thích, câu trả lời trước đó của người dùng để duy trì mạch hội thoại và phản hồi phù hợp.
- A sai vì bỏ qua input người dùng sẽ làm mất ngữ cảnh.
- C sai vì phản hồi ngẫu nhiên không duy trì được sự liên kết.
- D sai vì việc kết thúc hội thoại theo số lượt tương tác không liên quan đến chức năng duy trì ngữ cảnh.

quizSrc.term:
What mindset did Woodside notice amongst its workers after introducing an AI system?
A. Retiring workers resented their years of knowledge being reduced to a computer system.
B. Younger workers resisted contributing to the AI knowledge base.
C. Younger workers found the new technology difficult to incorporate into their day-to-day tasks.
D. Retiring workers are proud to leave their knowledge as a legacy for the future.
quizSrc.definition:
D. Retiring workers are proud to leave their knowledge as a legacy for the future
Giải thích: Sau khi áp dụng hệ thống AI, Woodside nhận thấy các nhân viên sắp nghỉ hưu có thái độ tích cực, xem việc chia sẻ kiến thức qua AI là cách để để lại di sản cho thế hệ sau.
- A sai vì không có sự phản đối từ người sắp nghỉ hưu.
- B sai vì không phải nhóm nhân viên trẻ phản đối đóng góp kiến thức.
- C sai vì không đề cập việc nhân viên trẻ gặp khó khăn khi sử dụng công nghệ mới.

quizSrc.term:
What type of learning involves AI systems learning from data without explicit programming?
A. Supervised learning
B. Reinforcement learning
C. Unsupervised learning
D. Deep learning
quizSrc.definition: C. Unsupervised learning — Là phương pháp cho phép AI học từ dữ liệu không nhãn, tự tìm ra cấu trúc/mẫu trong dữ liệu mà không cần lập trình tường minh.

quizSrc.term:
Which concept does the introduction module primarily cover in chatbot development without programming?
A. Complex algorithms in cryptography
B. Front-end web development techniques
C. Basic principles and concepts of chatbots
D. Robotics in AI applications
quizSrc.definition:
C. Basic principles and concepts of chatbots
Giải thích: Module giới thiệu về phát triển chatbot không yêu cầu lập trình thường tập trung vào các khái niệm cơ bản và nguyên lý hoạt động của chatbot để người học nắm nền tảng trước khi đi sâu hơn.
- A sai vì thuật toán mật mã không liên quan trực tiếp đến phát triển chatbot cơ bản.
- B sai vì kỹ thuật front-end web development không phải trọng tâm chính của module này.
- D sai vì robotics trong AI không liên quan đến nội dung giới thiệu chatbot.

quizSrc.term:
A Machine Learning technique that helps in detecting the outliers in data.
A. Clustering
B. Classification
C. Anamoly Detection
D. All of them
quizSrc.definition:
C. Anamoly Detection
Giải thích: Anomaly Detection là kỹ thuật chuyên dùng để phát hiện các điểm dữ liệu bất thường (outliers) so với phần lớn dữ liệu.
- A sai: Clustering phân nhóm dữ liệu, đôi khi có thể giúp phát hiện outlier nhưng không phải là mục tiêu chính.
- B sai: Classification phân loại dữ liệu vào các lớp đã biết, không tập trung vào phát hiện outlier.
- D sai: Không phải tất cả các kỹ thuật trên đều là phương pháp chính để phát hiện outlier, chỉ có Anomaly Detection là chuyên biệt cho mục tiêu này.

quizSrc.term:
Which of the following is the main purpose of using the user feedback loop?
A. To iteratively refine text prompts based on the response generated by the LLM
B. To generate responses with examples
C. To provide explicit instructions to generate neutral responses
D. To generate meaningful responses without needing prior training on specific prompts
quizSrc.definition:
A. To iteratively refine text prompts based on the response generated by the LLM
Giải thích: Vòng phản hồi từ người dùng (user feedback loop) được dùng để liên tục điều chỉnh và cải thiện prompt dựa trên phản hồi và kết quả sinh ra từ mô hình, nhằm tối ưu chất lượng phản hồi.
- B sai: Tạo phản hồi kèm ví dụ là một kỹ thuật hỗ trợ, không phải mục tiêu chính của feedback loop.
- C sai: Hướng dẫn tạo phản hồi trung lập chỉ là một mục tiêu phụ, không bao quát hết mục đích chính.
- D sai: Feedback loop không nhằm loại bỏ hoàn toàn nhu cầu huấn luyện trước, mà để cải thiện dựa trên kết quả hiện tại.

quizSrc.term:
How do 'digressions' contribute to chatbot functionality?
A. By ignoring user inputs
B. By maintaining rigid conversation structures
C. By allowing flexibility in conversation flows
D. By limiting user interactions
quizSrc.definition:
C. By allowing flexibility in conversation flows
Giải thích: "Digressions" trong chatbot cho phép cuộc trò chuyện rẽ sang các chủ đề khác nhau mà vẫn duy trì mạch tương tác, giúp chatbot linh hoạt hơn và đáp ứng tốt hơn nhu cầu người dùng.
- A sai: Bỏ qua input người dùng sẽ làm giảm trải nghiệm, không phải là chức năng của digression.
- B sai: Digressions giúp phá vỡ cấu trúc cứng nhắc, không phải duy trì nó.
- D sai: Mục tiêu là mở rộng tương tác, không phải giới hạn.

quizSrc.term:
How do digressions affect the flow of a conversation between a user and a chatbot?
A. Digressions help maintain focus on the original topic of the conversation
B. Digressions create confusion and frustration for users by shifting the conversation away from their intended query
C. Digressions encourage users to provide more information about their preferences and interests
D. Digressions have no impact on the flow of the conversation
quizSrc.definition:
C. Digressions encourage users to provide more information about their preferences and interests
Giải thích: Digressions cho phép chatbot mở rộng chủ đề và khuyến khích người dùng chia sẻ thêm về sở thích, nhu cầu hoặc bối cảnh, từ đó tăng sự cá nhân hóa và chất lượng đối thoại.
- A sai: Digressions không nhằm duy trì tập trung vào chủ đề gốc mà có thể chuyển hướng.
- B sai: Khi được thiết kế hợp lý, digressions không gây nhầm lẫn mà tăng tính tương tác.
- D sai: Digressions rõ ràng tác động đến mạch hội thoại, giúp mở rộng hoặc thay đổi hướng nói chuyện.

quizSrc.term: Why is clarity important when writing prompts for generative AI models?
quizSrc.definition: Clarity helps the model understand the task and produce relevant responses   Clarity adds to the complexity of the prompt

quizSrc.term:
How is Watson currently aiding in solving business problems based on the provided scenarios?
A. Gathering expertise learned from thousands of employees to reduce time spent on tracking down expert knowledge.
B. Using data from sensors to detect moisture levels in the air, helping irrigation systems give water where it's needed most.
C. Identifying the best routes based on traffic, temperature, and road conditions to transport bees for pollination.
D. Analyzing financial data to predict market trends and stock performance accurately.
quizSrc.definition:
A. Gathering expertise learned from thousands of employees to reduce time spent on tracking down expert knowledge
Giải thích: Watson được sử dụng để xử lý và phân tích khối lượng lớn dữ liệu từ nhiều nguồn nhằm truy xuất nhanh tri thức chuyên môn, giúp doanh nghiệp tiết kiệm thời gian và tối ưu hóa hiệu suất công việc.
- B sai: Đây là ứng dụng IoT và AI trong nông nghiệp, không phải tình huống Watson đang hỗ trợ trong bối cảnh này.
- C sai: Đây là ví dụ về tối ưu hóa logistics cho ong thụ phấn, không phải tình huống Watson được nêu.
- D sai: Mặc dù Watson có thể phân tích tài chính, nhưng kịch bản này không phải là nội dung cụ thể được đề cập ở đây.

quizSrc.term:
How does AI contribute to environmental conservation and sustainability?
A. Accelerating climate change impacts
B. Optimizing energy usage and waste reduction
C. Increasing pollution levels
D. Ignoring ecological issues
quizSrc.definition:
B. Optimizing energy usage and waste reduction
Giải thích: AI hỗ trợ bảo tồn môi trường và phát triển bền vững bằng cách phân tích dữ liệu để tối ưu hóa việc sử dụng năng lượng, giảm lãng phí và tăng hiệu quả sử dụng tài nguyên.
- A sai: Đây là tác động tiêu cực, không phải đóng góp của AI.
- C sai: AI không làm tăng ô nhiễm nếu được ứng dụng đúng cách.
- D sai: AI giúp giải quyết các vấn đề sinh thái, không bỏ qua chúng.

quizSrc.term:
Which of the following is NOT a common strategy for managing digressions in chatbots?
A. Redirecting the conversation back to the original topic
B. Ignoring the user's input and continuing with a predefined script
C. Acknowledging the digression and exploring the new topic briefly
D. Terminating the conversation abruptly
quizSrc.definition:
D. Terminating the conversation abruptly
Giải thích: Các chiến lược quản lý digression thường nhằm duy trì tương tác, giữ mạch hội thoại mượt mà và thân thiện. Việc kết thúc hội thoại đột ngột không phải là chiến lược phổ biến vì nó phá vỡ trải nghiệm người dùng.
- A đúng với thực tế: Đưa cuộc trò chuyện quay lại chủ đề chính là cách thường dùng.
- B đúng: Bỏ qua phần rẽ ngang và tiếp tục theo kịch bản định sẵn cũng là chiến lược phổ biến.
- C đúng: Thừa nhận digression và khám phá nhanh chủ đề mới giúp tạo cảm giác lắng nghe và linh hoạt.

quizSrc.term:
Which of the following is an attribute of Supervised Learning?
A. Relies on providing the machine learning algorithm unlabeled data and letting the machine infer qualities
B. Tries its best to maximize its rewards by trying different combinations of allowed actions within the provided constraints
C. Relies on providing the machine learning algorithm human-labeled data - the more samples you provide, the more precise the algorithm becomes in classifying new data
D. Relies on providing the machine learning algorithm with a set of rules and constraints and letting it learn how to achieve its goals
quizSrc.definition:
C. Relies on providing the machine learning algorithm human-labeled data - the more samples you provide, the more precise the algorithm becomes in classifying new data
Giải thích: Supervised Learning sử dụng dữ liệu đã được gán nhãn (labeled data) để huấn luyện mô hình, giúp nó dự đoán hoặc phân loại dữ liệu mới chính xác hơn.
- A sai: Đây là mô tả của Unsupervised Learning (dữ liệu không nhãn).
- B sai: Đây là Reinforcement Learning (học tăng cường).
- D sai: Đây là Rule-based system, không phải học máy.

quizSrc.term:
How are intents used in natural language understanding for chatbots?
A. To detect the emotion of the user
B. To identify the language being spoken
C. To classify the purpose or goal of the user's input
D. To generate random responses
quizSrc.definition: C. To classify the purpose or goal of the user's input — Intents giúp phân loại mục đích hoặc mục tiêu mà người dùng muốn truyền đạt, để chatbot phản hồi phù hợp.

quizSrc.term:
Which of the following are unstructured data sources?
A. Email
B. Blog posts
C. Relational Databases
D. Social media
quizSrc.definition: A, B, D — Email, blog posts và social media là dữ liệu phi cấu trúc, vì chúng không tuân theo định dạng bảng cố định, trong khi relational databases là dữ liệu có cấu trúc.

quizSrc.term:
How can 'digressions' within chatbot conversations be effectively balanced to ensure optimal user engagement?
A. By avoiding deviations entirely to maintain a focused conversation
B. By implementing random conversation paths for unpredictability
C. By strategically introducing deviations without overwhelming the user
D. By restricting conversational choices to pre-set options
quizSrc.definition: C — Cân nhắc đưa vào các sự lạc đề một cách chiến lược để tạo sự tự nhiên và hấp dẫn, nhưng không làm người dùng cảm thấy bị quá tải.

quizSrc.term:
How can prompt engineering be used to mitigate biases in AI models?
A. By generating prompts automatically using AI algorithms
B. By ensuring that prompts are designed to encourage diverse and inclusive responses
C. By ignoring prompts that may lead to biased outputs
D. By training models using biased datasets
quizSrc.definition: B — Thiết kế prompt theo hướng khuyến khích các phản hồi đa dạng và hòa nhập sẽ giúp giảm thiểu bias trong mô hình AI.

quizSrc.term: Which of the following is NOT a potential challenge associated with prompt engineering?
quizSrc.definition: Lack of available tools and resources for prompt engineering

quizSrc.term:
Using a generative AI tool, Emily wants to create an image of a zebra-striped cat with a purple hat. Identify the best prompt for this task.
A. List cat breeds that look like zebras or have stripes.
B. Draw an image of a zebra-striped cat with a purple hat.
C. What's the difference between a zebra and a cat?
D. Find a zebra-striped cat that wears a purple hat.
quizSrc.definition: B — Prompt này mô tả trực tiếp và rõ ràng yêu cầu tạo hình ảnh một con mèo sọc ngựa vằn đội mũ tím, phù hợp với nhiệm vụ sử dụng AI tạo sinh.

quizSrc.term:
What impact do well-implemented 'digressions' have on chatbot conversations?
A. Limiting conversational options for users
B. Enhancing natural conversation and user engagement
C. Increasing response times
D. Reducing chatbot functionality
quizSrc.definition: B — Các digressions được triển khai tốt giúp cuộc trò chuyện tự nhiên hơn và tăng mức độ tương tác của người dùng với chatbot.

quizSrc.term:
Which of these are attributes of IBM's Cognitive APIs?
A. IBM Cognitive APIs are based on an input/output system, where your input is data that the API feeds into Watson, and the output is the delivery of the overall outcome based on that data.
B. IBM Cognitive APIs can process only structured data as input and unstructured data as output.
C. IBM Cognitive APIs serve as a messenger between the input data and the output files on your local machine. These output files can then be transferred to the cloud.
D. IBM Cognitive APIs help AI professionals to build apps for mobile devices.
quizSrc.definition: A — IBM Cognitive APIs nhận dữ liệu làm input, xử lý bằng Watson, và trả kết quả đầu ra dựa trên dữ liệu đó.

quizSrc.term: Which of the following demonstrates an application of Artificial Intelligence in action based on the provided scenarios?
quizSrc.definition: Using facial recognition algorithms for suspect identification by law enforcement authorities.

quizSrc.term:
If one of a paired punctuation such as parentheses is missing:
A. The robot will assume that it is there and continue running
B. The program will not compile and the programmer will see an error message
C. The program will bypass that statement
D. The program will delete the paired punctuation that is not missing
quizSrc.definition:
B. The program will not compile and the programmer will see an error message.
Giải thích: Trong hầu hết các ngôn ngữ lập trình biên dịch, việc thiếu dấu ngoặc là lỗi cú pháp. Trình biên dịch sẽ dừng, không tạo file thực thi, và báo lỗi cho lập trình viên. Các đáp án A, C, D sai vì chương trình không tự giả định, không bỏ qua câu lệnh, và không tự xóa dấu còn lại.

quizSrc.term:
How do chatbots use entities to understand user queries and provide relevant responses?
A. By matching the detected entities to predefined actions or responses
B. By ignoring the entities and focusing only on the intent of the user's input
C. By asking the user for clarification about the entities
D. By randomly selecting a response from a list
quizSrc.definition:
A. By matching the detected entities to predefined actions or responses.
Giải thích: Chatbot sử dụng thực thể để trích xuất thông tin quan trọng (như tên, ngày, địa điểm) từ câu hỏi và ánh xạ chúng tới các hành động hoặc phản hồi đã được cấu hình. Các đáp án B, C, D sai vì bỏ qua thực thể, chỉ hỏi lại hoặc chọn ngẫu nhiên sẽ không tận dụng thông tin hữu ích từ thực thể.

quizSrc.term:
Which of the following are examples of bias in an AI system?
A. Facial recognition systems performing well for individuals of all skin tones.
B. Image recognition systems associating images of kitchens, shops, and laundry with women rather than men.
C. Customers not being aware that they are interacting with a chatbot on a company website.
D. AI systems in call centers providing context sensitive assistance to staff.
quizSrc.definition:
B. Image recognition systems associating images of kitchens, shops, and laundry with women rather than men.
Giải thích: Đây là thiên vị giới tính trong AI, xuất hiện khi mô hình học từ dữ liệu huấn luyện thiên lệch, dẫn đến việc gắn kết sai hoặc thiên lệch giữa hình ảnh và nhóm đối tượng. Các đáp án A, C, D không thể hiện thiên vị mà là tính năng tốt hoặc vấn đề minh bạch.

quizSrc.term:
Advances in the field of Computer Vision make which of the following possible
A. Real-time transcription
B. Detecting cancerous moles in skin images
C. Detecting fraudulent transactions
D. On-demand online tutors
quizSrc.definition: B. Detecting cancerous moles in skin images — Thị giác máy tính có thể phân tích và nhận diện các đặc điểm bất thường trong hình ảnh y tế, như phát hiện nốt ruồi ung thư, trong khi các lựa chọn khác thuộc về các lĩnh vực khác (xử lý giọng nói, phân tích dữ liệu, dịch vụ trực tuyến).

quizSrc.term:
What does generative AI do differently than discriminative AI?
A. Mimics the human ability to predict data
B. Mimics the human ability to analyze data
C. Mimics the human ability to classify data
D. Mimics the human ability to create data
quizSrc.definition: D. Mimics the human ability to create data — Generative AI có khả năng tạo ra dữ liệu mới (văn bản, hình ảnh, âm thanh...) dựa trên mẫu đã học, trong khi Discriminative AI chủ yếu phân loại hoặc dự đoán dữ liệu.

quizSrc.term:
Which concern in AI focuses on avoiding biased decision-making in algorithms?
A. AI Transparency
B. AI Ethics
C. AI Accountability
D. AI Fairness
quizSrc.definition: D. AI Fairness — Công bằng AI tập trung vào việc giảm hoặc loại bỏ sự thiên lệch trong các mô hình và thuật toán, đảm bảo kết quả công bằng cho tất cả các nhóm.

quizSrc.term:
How does the interview pattern approach enhance the interaction with generative AI models?
A. By focusing on a conventional prompting approach
B. By hierarchically structuring a prompt or query
C. By promoting a back-and-forth exchange of information with the model
D. By providing a single static prompt to the model.
quizSrc.definition: C. By promoting a back-and-forth exchange of information with the model — Phương pháp "interview pattern" khuyến khích đối thoại nhiều lượt giữa người dùng và AI để tinh chỉnh và cải thiện kết quả.

quizSrc.term:
Why are 'digressions' employed within chatbot conversations?
A. To confuse users intentionally
B. To enhance natural and engaging conversations
C. To slow down the conversation pace
D. To enforce strict conversation paths
quizSrc.definition: B. To enhance natural and engaging conversations — Giúp cuộc trò chuyện trở nên tự nhiên, thu hút và thân thiện hơn với người dùng.

quizSrc.term:
A metaverse platform with generative AI capabilities will allow you to access __________, which is not possible with other generative AI tools.
A. Virtual avatars
B. Synthetic images
C. Augmented data sets
D. Clear and contextually relevant text
quizSrc.definition: A. Virtual avatars — Cho phép tạo và sử dụng avatar ảo để tương tác trong môi trường 3D, điều mà các công cụ AI tạo sinh truyền thống không cung cấp.

quizSrc.term: Tiana is designing a game and decides to create one avatar with specific personality traits. What type of generative AI capability is Tiana using?
quizSrc.definition: Ability to create virtual worlds

quizSrc.term:
Raechel wants to apply the process of prompt engineering to create an effective prompt for generating creative ideas for the marketing campaign of a new eco-friendly home cleaning product. Identify the best prompt for this task.
A. List the benefits of the new eco-friendly home cleaning product through campaigns organized by the company so that more and more people will be attracted to this product.
B. Generate ideas to sell a new product in the digital market through marketing campaigns and creative ideas.
C. Generate three creative and detailed ideas for a digital marketing campaign to promote a new eco-friendly home cleaning product. Consider the target audience, product strengths, marketing channels, and unique propositions for selling the product.
D. Give information about the price of an eco-friendly home cleaning product. This will help the customers compare the price of this product with other products availa
quizSrc.definition: C. Generate three creative and detailed ideas for a digital marketing campaign... — Cụ thể, chi tiết và bao quát các yếu tố cần thiết để tạo ý tưởng marketing hiệu quả.

quizSrc.term:
Which of the following statements about datasets used in Machine Learning is NOT true?
A. Validation data subset is used to validate results and fine-tune the algorithm's parameters
B. Training data is used to fine-tune algorithm's parameters and evaluate how good the model is
C. Training subset is the data used to train the algorithm
quizSrc.definition: B. Training data is used to fine-tune algorithm's parameters and evaluate how good the model is — Sai vì đánh giá mô hình phải dùng validation hoặc test set, không dùng training set.

quizSrc.term: Monica is a writer looking to improve her storytelling by using a large language model (LLM) for creative writing prompts. Which feature of a prompt engineering tool would be most beneficial for her to achieve this goal?
quizSrc.definition: Suggesting different prompt formats (like questions, dialogues, or scenarios) tailored to the preferred storytelling style (such as mystery, romance, or sci-fi)

quizSrc.term:
Ethics in artificial intelligence is:
A. Something that is not an issue.
B. Something that is entirely solved in current AI systems.
C. Something that we need to apply today.
D. Something that somebody else is going to do in the future.
quizSrc.definition:
C - Ethics in AI là vấn đề cần áp dụng ngay để đảm bảo an toàn, công bằng và minh bạch.
A sai vì đây là vấn đề nghiêm trọng.
B sai vì chưa có giải pháp hoàn thiện.
D sai vì không thể trì hoãn cho tương lai.

quizSrc.term:
Which of these is NOT a current application of AI?
A. Self-Driving vehicles utilizing Computer Vision to navigate around objects
B. Classifying rock samples to identify best places to drill for oil
C. Collaborative Robots helping humans lift heavy containers
D. Making precise patient diagnosis and prescribing independent treatment
quizSrc.definition:
D - AI chưa được phép tự kê đơn điều trị độc lập vì lý do pháp lý và đạo đức.
A, B, C đều là các ứng dụng AI đang tồn tại thực tế.

quizSrc.term:
How are 'entities' utilized in AI-powered chatbots?
A. Understanding complex mathematical algorithms
B. Identifying and extracting specific information from user inputs
C. Enhancing visual design elements
D. Analyzing server performance metrics
quizSrc.definition:
B - Entities được dùng để xác định và trích xuất thông tin cụ thể từ dữ liệu đầu vào của người dùng.
A sai vì không liên quan đến thuật toán toán học.
C sai vì không liên quan đến thiết kế giao diện.
D sai vì không liên quan đến phân tích hiệu suất máy chủ.

quizSrc.term:
Which of the following is an attribute of Strong or Generalized AI
A. Operate with human-level consciousness
B. Cannot teach itself new strategies
C. Perform independent tasks
D. Can perform specific tasks, but cannot learn new ones
quizSrc.definition:
A - AI mạnh (General AI) có khả năng nhận thức ở mức con người, hiểu và học các nhiệm vụ mới.
B sai vì Strong AI có thể tự học chiến lược mới.
C sai vì chỉ nói thực hiện nhiệm vụ độc lập chưa đủ để định nghĩa Strong AI.
D sai vì mô tả Narrow AI, không phải General AI.

quizSrc.term:
Which of the following aspects involved in converting the stethoscope into a digital device to support patient diagnoses involves the use of AI?
A. An app on the mobile device that applies learnings from previous diagnosis data to assist the physicians in their current diagnoses
B. Sending digital signals to a mobile device with a machine learning app via bluetooth
C. Inserting a digitizer into the stethoscope tube to convert the analog sound of the heart beat into a digital signal
D. Graphing heart beat data on the mobile device allowing a physician to spot trends
quizSrc.definition: A — Vì ứng dụng này áp dụng những gì đã học từ dữ liệu chẩn đoán trước để hỗ trợ chẩn đoán mới, đây là biểu hiện rõ ràng của AI. Các phương án B, C, D chỉ liên quan đến thu thập, truyền hoặc hiển thị dữ liệu chứ không phải xử lý và học từ dữ liệu.

quizSrc.term: Which of the following is NOT a good way to define AI?
quizSrc.definition: AI is all about machines replacing human intelligence.

quizSrc.term: Which of the following is an attribute of Strong or Generalized AI?
quizSrc.definition: Perform independent tasks

quizSrc.term: AI is the fusion of many fields of study. Which of these fields, along with Computer Science, plays a role in the application of AI?
quizSrc.definition: All responses are correct

quizSrc.term: Which of these is NOT a current application of AI?
quizSrc.definition: Making precise patient diagnosis and prescribing independent treatment

quizSrc.term: Natural Language AI algorithms that learn by example are the reason we can talk to machines and they can talk back to us.
quizSrc.definition: True

quizSrc.term: Advances in the field of Computer Vision make which of the following possible?
quizSrc.definition: Detecting cancerous moles in skin images

quizSrc.term: Which of these is currently NOT an application of Collaborative Robots or Cobots?
quizSrc.definition: Personal use in the home such as doing the laundry and cooking for example

quizSrc.term: Which of the following aspects involved in converting the stethoscope into a digital device to support patient diagnoses involves the use of AI?
quizSrc.definition: An app on the mobile device that applies learnings from previous diagnosis data to assist the physicians in their current diagnoses

quizSrc.term:
Which of the following are applications of Artificial Intelligence in action?
1) IBM Watson utilizing its information retrieval capabilities to provide technical information to oil and gas company workers.
2) Watson analyzing Grammy nominated song lyrics over a 60-year period and categorizing them based on their emotions.
3) Assisting patients with neurological damage by detecting patterns in massive movement related datasets and using robots to trigger specific movements in the human body to create new neural pathways in the brain.
4) Law enforcement authorities using facial recognition algorithms to identify suspects in multiple streams of video footage
quizSrc.definition: All of the options are correct

quizSrc.term: Which of these statements is true?
quizSrc.definition: Deep Learning is a specialized subset of Machine Learning that uses layered neural networks to simulate human decision-making

quizSrc.term: Which of the following is NOT an attribute of Machine Learning?
quizSrc.definition: Takes data and rules as input and uses these inputs to develop an algorithm that will give us an answer

quizSrc.term: Which of the following is NOT an attribute of Unsupervised Learning?
quizSrc.definition: Takes data and rules as input and uses these inputs to develop an algorithm that will give us an answer

quizSrc.term: Which of the following is an attribute of Supervised Learning?
quizSrc.definition: Relies on providing the machine learning algorithm human-labeled data - the more samples you provide, the more precise the algorithm becomes in classifying new data

quizSrc.term: Which of the following statements about datasets used in Machine Learning is NOT true?
quizSrc.definition: Training data is used to fine-tune algorithm's parameters and evaluate how good the model is

quizSrc.term: When creating deep learning algorithms, developers configure the number of layers and the type of functions that connect the outputs of each layer to the inputs of the next.
quizSrc.definition: True

quizSrc.term: Which of the following fields of application for AI can be used at the airport to flag weapons within luggage passing through the X-ray scanner?
quizSrc.definition: Computer Vision

quizSrc.term: Which of these activities is not required in order for a neural network to synthesize human voice?
quizSrc.definition: Deconstruct sentences to decipher the context of use

quizSrc.term: Which one of these ways is NOT how AI learns?
quizSrc.definition: Proactive Learning

quizSrc.term: How is AI being used to control infectious disease?
quizSrc.definition: AIME uses more than 270 variables to predict the next outbreak of Dengue fever.

quizSrc.term: The proliferation of AI will create new ways of working and new jobs for which people must prepare.
quizSrc.definition: True

quizSrc.term: What are the three principles that IBM follows to create ethical AI?
quizSrc.definition: Transparency, Skills, Purpose

quizSrc.term: Ethics in artificial intelligence is:
quizSrc.definition: Something that we need to apply today.

quizSrc.term: One approach that helps developers avoid unintentionally creating bias in AI systems is:
quizSrc.definition: Using a wide variety of appropriately diverse data for training.

quizSrc.term: Which of the following statements about IBM's views on AI are correct?
quizSrc.definition: All of the above.

quizSrc.term: Which of the following are examples of bias in an AI system?
quizSrc.definition: Image recognition systems associating images of kitchens, shops, and laundry with women rather than men.

quizSrc.term: There is concern that some jobs will be replaced by AI systems. Which of the following characteristics make a job a good candidate for replacement?
quizSrc.definition: Rules-based decision-making.

quizSrc.term: Ethical concerns with AI systems are:
quizSrc.definition: Something that should be the concern of every AI developer, so they can be mitigated for as AI systems are developed.

quizSrc.term:
What are some of the ethical concerns around artificial intelligence?
1) Racial, gender or other types of bias.
2) Loss of jobs due to AI replacing workers performing repetitive tasks.
3) Concern about the trustworthiness of decision-making supported by AI systems.
4) Privacy, for example, as human faces are photographed and recognized in public spaces.
quizSrc.definition: All of the options are correct

quizSrc.term: Which of the following NOT a way AI is being used to benefit humanity?
quizSrc.definition: Crime: to identify criminals before they commit a crime.

quizSrc.term: How many new opportunities and job roles does the World Economic Forum expect that AI will create in the next few years?
quizSrc.definition: 133 million

quizSrc.term: What is a significant way in which developers of AI systems can guard against introducing bias?
quizSrc.definition: Providing effective training data and performing regular tests and audits.

quizSrc.term: Watson is an Artificial Intelligence System.
quizSrc.definition: True

quizSrc.term: Deep Learning is what enables Watson's natural language understanding capabilities.
quizSrc.definition: True

quizSrc.term: In which layer of the Watson Transfer Learning model does customer specific learning take place?
quizSrc.definition: Top layer

quizSrc.term:
RBS has employed CORA, powered by Watson, to deliver better customer service and empower the customer service center agents. Which of the following statements about CORA are correct?
1) Cora is trained with over 200 customer intents and has over a thousand responses to those intents.
2) Cora has the ability to address all customer queries eliminating the need for a human agent talk to the customer.
3) Cora offers guidance to the customer so they can help themselves.
4) Cora hands off the customer seamlessly to an agent for complicated questions that may require human intervention.
quizSrc.definition: Only options 1, 3, and 4 are correct

quizSrc.term: Which of the following is an attribute of Watson Assistant?
quizSrc.definition: Watson Assistant ensures that customer data is protected.

quizSrc.term: Which of these statements best reflects how businesses are implementing chatbots in customer service?
quizSrc.definition: Businesses are looking to balance customer interactions between human agents and chatbots.

quizSrc.term: If you were part of a financial institution using disparate systems to manage regulations, obligations, policies, and controls, which of the IBM Watson solutions would you opt for in order to streamline the compliance lifecycle?
quizSrc.definition: Watson Regulatory Compliance

quizSrc.term: What are three Watson APIs that are particularly useful for organizations that want to create more personalized chatbot experiences?
quizSrc.definition: Personality Insights, Tone Analyzer and Natural Language Classifier.

quizSrc.term: If you were given the responsibility to select an appropriate use case for implementing AI in your organization, which of these two approaches is best?
quizSrc.definition: Focus on selecting a use case that can best demonstrate the benefit of AI to your organization.

quizSrc.term: Which of these ways is NOT a Watson AI feature that benefits businesses?
quizSrc.definition: Training systems with massive amounts of training data to keep them updated.

quizSrc.term:
In which of the following ways is Watson currently helping solve business problems?
1) Gathering expertise learned from thousands of employees to reduce time spent on tracking down expert knowledge.
2) Using data from sensors to detect moisture levels in the air, helping irrigation systems give water where it's needed most.
3) Identifying the best routes based on traffic, temperature, and road conditions to transport bees for pollination.
quizSrc.definition: 1, 2, and 3 are all correct.

quizSrc.term: Which of the following statements about Transfer Learning is INCORRECT?
quizSrc.definition: Transfer Learning requires massive amounts of training data for each new related use case.

quizSrc.term:
What are the different approaches clients can take to enrich their customer service experience?
1) Clients can use IBM Watson's 24/7 AI-powered virtual assistant to engage with customers to resolve their queries.
2) Clients can use IBM Watson Assistant as a behind the scenes assistant to help employees in how they engage directly with their customers.
3) Clients can use IBM Watson Assistant to manage the complete customer service cycle, end-to-end, eliminating the need for human intervention.
4) Clients can deploy IBM Watson Assistant powered chatbots along with other Watson services like Watson Discovery to get answers to a wide range of questions about a product.
quizSrc.definition: Only options 1, 2, and 4 are correct

quizSrc.term: Which of the following is an attribute of intelligent chatbots?
quizSrc.definition: An intelligent bot can understand when the customer is best served by a human agent and connects the customer to a human agent for such interactions.

quizSrc.term: Which of these are examples of Watson assisting in compliance-oriented business processes?
quizSrc.definition: Analyzing structured and unstructured data in incident reports to identify the causes and corresponding mitigation actions.   Helping data privacy professionals maintain an up to the minute understanding of the continually evolving regulations, across jurisdictions.   Assisting legal teams by analyzing transactions to ensure adherence to tax law compliances.   Helping professionals analyze contracts and statements of work to facilitate effective contract governance and fulfillment of tangible items and services.

quizSrc.term: Which of these are attributes of IBM's Cognitive APIs?
quizSrc.definition: IBM Cognitive APIs are based on an input/output system, where your input is data that the API feeds into Watson, and the output is the delivery of the overall outcome based on that data.

quizSrc.term: Watson's 3-layered transfer learning model allows businesses to retain complete ownership of their data and insights.
quizSrc.definition: True

quizSrc.term: Which of these are the first three steps customers should take to get started on their AI Journey?
quizSrc.definition: Prove, adopt and scale

quizSrc.term:
How is Watson AI currently serving businesses?
1) Processing massive amounts of data faster.
2) Helping systems learn with minimal amount of training data.
3) Protecting customer-specific data and insights.
4) Helping businesses benefit from the advantages that AI offers without developing AI models from scratch.
quizSrc.definition: 1, 2, 3, and 4 are all correct.

quizSrc.term: Which of these are benefits clients are seeing with the use of intelligent chatbots in customer service?
quizSrc.definition: Greater job satisfaction for human agents as they engage in the more fulfilling customer interactions that require their creativity and decision-making capabilities.

quizSrc.term: IBM Watson AI services are currently available ONLY on IBM Cloud.
quizSrc.definition: False

quizSrc.term: Which of the following does Watson Assistant help you create?
quizSrc.definition: Chatbots

quizSrc.term: Which statement about Watson Discovery is correct?
quizSrc.definition: Watson Discovery gives you the ability to store, analyze, and understand your data at scale.

quizSrc.term: Which of the following are unstructured data sources?
quizSrc.definition: Email   Blog posts   Social media

quizSrc.term: Using Watson Knowledge Studio enables you to teach Watson about the specialized terminology used in your industry.
quizSrc.definition: True

quizSrc.term: True or false: Watson Speech to Text can transcribe only pre-recorded audio, not live audio streams.
quizSrc.definition: False

quizSrc.term: If you want to create very specific pronunciations for Watson Text to Speech, which of the following can you use?
quizSrc.definition: International Phonetic Alphabet   IBM Symbolic Phonetic Representation notation

quizSrc.term: True or False: Watson Natural Language Classifier enables users to organize data by having machine learning analyze text, label items, and sort data into custom categories.
quizSrc.definition: True

quizSrc.term: Which of the following AI offerings does IBM Watson provide?
quizSrc.definition: Advanced APIs, specialized tooling, and Software as a Service (SaaS)

quizSrc.term: Which of the following statements about Watson Assistant is correct?
quizSrc.definition: Watson Assistant understands the intent of what users are saying.

quizSrc.term:
Which of the following tasks does Watson Discovery perform?
1) Ingest and standardize both structured and unstructured data.
2) Use natural language queries to search your data.
3) Create a chatbot to interact with your customers.
4) Display your data with time series, graphs and aggregations.
quizSrc.definition: Only options 1, 2, and 4 are correct

quizSrc.term: Which of the following tasks can Watson Natural Language Understanding help you with?
quizSrc.definition: Extracting the names of people and places discussed in a news article.

quizSrc.term: You are developing an app that can analyze images and text from unstructured sources. Which Watson Service would you use?
quizSrc.definition: Watson Visual Recognition

quizSrc.term: Which of the following is a feature of Watson Knowledge Studio?
quizSrc.definition: Helps you build a machine learning model to extract information specific to your business.

quizSrc.term: Which of the following statements about Watson Speech to Text is correct?
quizSrc.definition: Watson Speech to Text converts human voice to text.

quizSrc.term: Which of the following statements about Watson Text to Speech is correct?
quizSrc.definition: Watson Text to Speech converts written text to natural sounding language.

quizSrc.term: Which of the following is the reason for choosing Watson Language Translator over a human translator?
quizSrc.definition: Watson Language Translator can translate data from a wide variety of sources.

quizSrc.term: You work for a recruitment company, and you are looking for help to sort through the huge volumes of applications you receive for each job you advertise. Which of the following capabilities of Watson Language Classifier will help you with this task?
quizSrc.definition: Organize job applicants into categories based on key skills listed on their applications.

quizSrc.term: Which of the following statements about Watson Studio is correct?
quizSrc.definition: Watson Studio features a drag-and-drop method for building and deploying machine learning models.

quizSrc.term: Which of the following benefits does Watson Machine Learning bring to an organization?
quizSrc.definition: It comes with a wide range of pretrained models and datasets.

quizSrc.term: You want to understand and catalog the vast amounts of data that your organization receives from various sources, including RDBMS, NoSQL, file systems, and Hadoop. Which of the following Watson Services can help you with this process?
quizSrc.definition: Watson Knowledge Catalog

quizSrc.term: What is the significance of Alexnet?
quizSrc.definition: Alexnet was the first neural network which used backpropagation with a convolutional neural network. Alexnet beat all other competitors in the Image.net challenge in 2012.

quizSrc.term: Which of the following statements about Watson Visual recognition is correct?
quizSrc.definition: Watson Visual Recognition can detect human faces and identify qualities such as gender and age of facial features.

quizSrc.term: Watson Personality Insights can detect personality characteristics from text written by individuals, which enables your organization to tailor communication with the individual.
quizSrc.definition: True

quizSrc.term: Which of the following statements about Watson Tone Analyzer is correct?
quizSrc.definition: Watson Tone Analyzer can be used to measure the performance of your customer service agents.

quizSrc.term: Which feature of Watson OpenScale will help you to recommend new models to be applied across your business?
quizSrc.definition: NeuNets (Neural Network Synthesis)

quizSrc.term: Which of the following statements about Watson Compare and Comply is INCORRECT?
quizSrc.definition: Watson Compare and Comply compares a document with a custom grammatical model and ensures that it is in compliance.

quizSrc.term: True or false: When you use your data with any Watson Service, you must agree to allow IBM full access to that data.
quizSrc.definition: False

quizSrc.term: Which of the following built-in technologies helps you build machine learning models with a simplified graphical interface?
quizSrc.definition: Neural Network Modeler

quizSrc.term: Which of the following statements about Watson Machine Learning is correct?
quizSrc.definition: Watson Machine Learning is a set of REST APIs that you can call from any programming language.

quizSrc.term: Which of the following statements about Watson Knowledge Catalog active policy enforcement capabilities is correct?
quizSrc.definition: Support automatic and dynamic masking of sensitive data elements.

quizSrc.term: Which of the following statements about Watson Visual Recognition service is NOT correct?
quizSrc.definition: Comes trained to your custom specifications with the image data you supply to IBM.

quizSrc.term: You are building a visual recognition system that will identify malformed widgets. Which capability of Watson Visual Recognition will make this possible?
quizSrc.definition: The ability to build custom models to recognize between good and defective widgets coming out of the assembly line.

quizSrc.term: Which of the following statements about Watson Personality Insights is correct?
quizSrc.definition: Watson Personality Insights requires no training, it works right out of the box.

quizSrc.term: You are building an AI system that can escalate a customer service call if the customer's mood becomes angry. Which Watson Service(s) can help you with this?
quizSrc.definition: Watson Tone Analyzer

quizSrc.term: Which of the following statements about Watson OpenScale is correct?
quizSrc.definition: Watson OpenScale is an open platform that operates and automates AI across its lifecycle.

quizSrc.term: You are building an AI system that will help you to identify the payment terms specified in your contracts with third-parties. Which of the following Watson Services could you use?
quizSrc.definition: Watson Compare and Comply

quizSrc.term: You are building an AI system that will help you to create personalized marketing content which includes written and voice communication in an appropriate tone for each customer. Which Watson Services can help you with this task?
quizSrc.definition: Watson Tone Analyzer

quizSrc.term: To get the best out of Watson Services on the IBM Cloud, you must be located in a major metropolitan area, so that you have access to a very high speed internet connection.
quizSrc.definition: False

quizSrc.term: Watson Studio enables organisations to build their own AI models and leverage open source capabilities and technologies.
quizSrc.definition: True

quizSrc.term: Which of the following capabilities are benefits of Watson Oncology?
quizSrc.definition: Watson for Oncology helps clinicians consistently create treatment regimes by ensuring they have access to the most up to date information.

quizSrc.term: Which of the following statements about Watson Clinical Trial Matching is correct?
quizSrc.definition: Watson Clinical Trial Matching identifies clinical trials appropriate for the patient for the physician to consider.

quizSrc.term: Watson for Genomics helps accelerate the process of locating information relevant to the genetic profile of a tumor sample.
quizSrc.definition: True

quizSrc.term: What do Abu Dhabi National Oil Company (ADNOC) hope that the use of AI will help them achieve?
quizSrc.definition: To understand their business better and retain knowledge.

quizSrc.term:
Which of the following are challenges that LivePerson identified in creating positive interactions between customer and company?
1) People are turning to self-service and messaging as a preferred way to engage with customer service.
2) Legacy voice channels are frustrating for the customer, expensive, and don't necessarily work well.
3) Frustrating experiences interacting with customers lead to high agent attrition.
4) Consumers prefer to interact with customer service agents by email or by voice.
quizSrc.definition: Only options 1, 2, and 3 are correct.

quizSrc.term: The performance of chatbots can be evaluated in the same way as human agents - with Customer Satisfaction (CSat) scores.
quizSrc.definition: True

quizSrc.term: Which of Connie's capabilities will enable her to adjust the way she responds to customers' questions?
quizSrc.definition: The ability to sense emotions such as urgency.

quizSrc.term: At Bradesco, how many questions per month does Watson answer, and at what accuracy?
quizSrc.definition: 283,000 questions a month with a 95% accuracy rate.

quizSrc.term: Which of the following are applications of Artificial Intelligence in action?
quizSrc.definition: Watson analyzing Grammy nominated song lyrics over a 60-year period and categorizing them based on their emotions.

quizSrc.term: Is the following an application of Machine Learning and AI: A machine that beats human in a game in which all rules and moves have been pre-programmed into the machine - true or false?
quizSrc.definition: False

quizSrc.term: Data Science is a subset of AI that uses machine learning algorithms to extract meaning and draw inferences from data.
quizSrc.definition: False

quizSrc.term:
Which of the following are attributes of Machine Learning?
a. Machine learning algorithms can be continuously trained and used in the future to predict values
b. Defines behavioral rules by comparing large data sets to find common patterns
c. Takes data and answers as input and use these inputs to create a set of rules that determine what the Machine Learning model will be
d. In Machine Learning models, when we submit inputs, we get answers based on predefined rules
quizSrc.definition: a b c

quizSrc.term: We can use reinforcement learning to teach a machine to play chess.
quizSrc.definition: True

quizSrc.term:
Which of the following are attributes of Classification?
a. Forms of classification include decision trees, support vector machines, logistic regression and random forests
b. Using classification models we extract features from data and classify results into multiple categories
c. Classification is the process of predicting the class of given data points
d. Classification models are built by looking at the relationships between features and results, where results are a continuous variable
quizSrc.definition: a b c

quizSrc.term:
Which of the following are attributes of Perceptrons?
a. Input layers forward the input values to the next layer by means of multiplying by a weight and summing the results
b. Each layer of neurons conducts a mathematical operation on the output of the previous layer
c. An activation function determines how a node responds to its inputs
d. Perceptrons are single-layered neural networks consisting of input nodes connected directly to an output node
quizSrc.definition: a c d

quizSrc.term:
Which of the following are attributes of backpropagation in Neural Networks?
a. The process works on the basis of reward and punishment depending on how close the given output is to the desired output
b. The process reduces errors over time by determining how far a given output is from the desired output
c. An error function determines how far the given output is from the desired output
d. Backpropagation uses training datasets to train neural networks to match known inputs to desired outputs
quizSrc.definition: b c d

quizSrc.term:
Which of the following is an attribute of Natural Language Processing (NLP)?
a. NLP systems can understand intent
b. NLP systems are provided recorded voice samples with corresponding text to help them discern common patterns
c. NLP systems use a broad array of linguistic models and algorithms to draw inferences from language
d. NLP systems can identify the emotion in which a word is spoken, for example, frustration, confusion, irritation, or fun etc.
quizSrc.definition: a c d

quizSrc.term:
In order for a self-driving vehicle to navigate accurately, it needs to piece together a complete view of its driving environment, which it does with the help of:
a. Vision data
b. Radar data
c. Laser data
d. Data Science
quizSrc.definition: a b c

quizSrc.term: RBS has employed CORA, powered by Watson, to deliver better customer service and empower the customer service center agents. Which of the following statements about CORA are correct?
quizSrc.definition: Only options A, C, and D are correct

quizSrc.term: In which of the following ways is Watson currently helping solve business problems?
quizSrc.definition: A, B, and C are all correct.

quizSrc.term: What are the different approaches clients can take to enrich their customer service experience?
quizSrc.definition: Clients can deploy IBM Watson Assistant powered chatbots along with other Watson services like Watson Discovery to get answers to a wide range of questions about a product. -----

quizSrc.term:
Which of these are examples of Watson assisting in compliance-oriented business processes?
a. Helping professionals analyze contracts and statements of work to facilitate effective contract governance and fulfillment of tangible items and services.
b. Helping data privacy professionals maintain an up to the minute understanding of the continually evolving regulations, across jurisdictions.
c. Assisting legal teams by analyzing transactions to ensure adherence to tax law compliances.
d. Creating spam filters to prevent phishing scams involving legal notices.
e. Analyzing structured and unstructured data in incident reports to identify the causes and corresponding mitigation actions.
quizSrc.definition: a b c e

quizSrc.term: How is Watson AI currently serving businesses?
quizSrc.definition: Helping businesses benefit from the advantages that AI offers without developing AI models from scratch. -----

quizSrc.term:
Which of the following are unstructured data sources?
a. Blog posts
b. Email
c. Social media
d. Relational Databases
quizSrc.definition: a b c

quizSrc.term:
If you want to create very specific pronunciations for Watson Text to Speech, which of the following can you use?
a. International Phonetic Alphabet
b. IBM Symbolic Phonetic Representation notation
c. Received Pronunciation
d. International Radiotelephony Spelling Alphabet
quizSrc.definition: a b

quizSrc.term: Which of the following tasks does Watson Discovery perform?
quizSrc.definition: Only options A, B, and D are correct

quizSrc.term: Which of the following are challenges that LivePerson identified in creating positive interactions between customer and company?
quizSrc.definition: Only options A, B, and C are correct.
